post.description: The "Create Shipping Zone" API allows adding a new shipping zone.

get.description: The "List Shipping Zone" API allows to retrieve a list of shipping zone.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to be included in a single page of results

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting index of the page, indicating the position from which the results should be retrieved.

get.description: The "List Shipping Zone" API allows to retrieve a paginated list of shipping zone.

parameters.name: shippingZoneId
parameters.description: ID of the item that needs to be returned

put.description: The "update Shipping Zone" API allows update a shipping zone to the system.

parameters.name: shippingZoneId
parameters.description: ID of the item that needs to be returned

delete.description: Delete specific shipping zone with Id :shippingZoneId

parameters.name: shippingZoneId
parameters.description: ID of the item that needs to be returned

post.description: This return available shipping rates for country based on order amount
The "Create Shipping Rate" API allows adding a new shipping rate.

parameters.description: ID of the item that needs to be returned

parameters.description: ID of the item that needs to be returned

parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The starting index of the page, indicating the position from which the results should be retrieved.

get.description: The "List Shipping Rate" API allows to retrieve a paginated list of shipping rate.

parameters.name: shippingRateId
parameters.description: ID of the shipping rate that needs to be returned

put.description: The "update Shipping Rate" API allows update a shipping rate to the system.

parameters.description: ID of the shipping rate that needs to be returned

delete.description: Delete specific shipping rate with Id :shippingRateId

post.description: The "Create Shipping Carrier" API allows adding a new shipping carrier.

get.description: The "List Shipping Carrier" API allows to retrieve a list of shipping carrier.
The "List Shipping Carrier" API allows to retrieve a paginated list of shipping carrier.

parameters.description: ID of the shipping carrier that needs to be returned

parameters.description: ID of the shipping carrier that needs to be returned

parameters.description: ID of the shipping carrier that needs to be returned

post.description: Create or update store settings by altId and altType.

get.description: Get store settings by altId and altType.

bearer.name: Authorization
bearer.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Sub-Account (OR) Private Integration Token of Sub-Account.

Location-Access.name: Authorization
Location-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Sub-Account (OR) Private Integration Token of Sub-Account.

Agency-Access.name: Authorization
Agency-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Agency (OR) Private Integration Token of Agency.

states.description: List of states that are available. If states is empty, then all states are available

countries.description: List of countries that are available

name.description: Name of the shipping carrier service

value.description: Value of the shipping carrier service

currency.description: The currency of the amount of the rate / handling fee

amount.description: The amount of the shipping rate if it is normal rate (0 means free ). Fixed Handling fee if it is a carrier rate (it will add to the carrier rate).

conditionType.description: Type of condition to provide the conditional pricing

minCondition.description: Minimum condition for applying this price. set 0 or null if there is no minimum

maxCondition.description: Maximum condition for applying this price. set 0 or null if there is no maximum

percentageOfRateFee.description: Percentage of rate fee if it is a carrier rate.

_id.description: The unique identifier for the product.

shippingZoneId.description: The unique identifier for the shipping zone.

countries.description: List of countries that are available

shippingRates.description: Array of shipping rates under this shipping zone

amountAvailable.description: it will not calculate the order amount form backend if it is true

totalOrderAmount.description: The amount of the price. ( min: 0.01 )

weightAvailable.description: Flag to pass when the weight is already calculated and should not calculate again

totalOrderWeight.description: Estimated weight of the order calculated from the order creation side in kg(s)

products.description: An array of price IDs and quantity

currency.description: The currency of the amount of the rate / handling fee

amount.description: The amount of the shipping rate if it is normal rate (0 means free ). Fixed Handling fee if it is a carrier rate (it will add to the carrier rate).

percentageOfRateFee.description: Percentage of rate fee if it is a carrier rate.
